"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b0cb7f63687209c3610200#post_54b0cb7f63687209c3610200

The most common explanation is that she didn't get as much exposure to Gamma Rays as Bruce, therefore she has some of the same abilities but not to the extent of his cousin. That also explains why she doesn't get a boost the more angrier she gets and why she's capable of keeping her cool when trnasformed... Or just plain fanservice

Comic books logic

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b0cb7f63687209c3610200#post_54b0cb7f63687209c3610200
It's a loooooooong story.
Jennifer Walters didn't get her powers like Bruce Banner did, She was actually involved in a drive-by shooting that left her comatose and needing a blood transfusion. However the only viable donor was her cousin. BRUCE BANNER a.k.a. The Incredible Hulk. She got the transfusion but also got a diluted version of Banners powers. So while she isn't NEARLY as strong as her cousin, she mantains her mental faculties.

topics.body:
Hey ever wanted to see what the marvel universe might look like in grim grim reality? No I don't mean Ultimate universe. I mean if reality ensues hit alot of the marvel universe (to a degree).

Or if you read Marvels and just felt like you couldn't stomach the happiness you felt after.

Behold! Marvel's Ruins!

!http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/d/d0/Warren_Ellis_Ruins_1_cover.jpg/250px-Warren_Ellis_Ruins_1_cover.jpg!

Behold The hulk after he meets the cancer that comes with being exposed to radiation!

Warning: Gruesome as hell
[spoiler]!http://siguealconejoblanco.es/comics/wp-content/uploads/2011/11/ruins-warren-ellis_11.jpg!
!http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v164/Anjin-San/0001trx7.jpg![/spoiler]

!

topics.body: And I would argue that her physique isn't the most intrinsic part of her character.Remember, not only is Jennifer an active super hero, she's also a lawyer. She's funny and cheerful as well. Sone of her best moments aren't when she's punching out baddies but putting them behind bars in court.

topics.body:
Progress tonight:

>Had chat with Seraph about Jerry Peet/Bhaalspawn. 
That went well.
>Got off my soapbox tonight about sexual content. 
That went well too.

Yes I am Roman Catholic, if anyone is wondering. But I'm not here to rant off about my religious beliefs. I'd do that in the religion thread. But all I've got to say is, I don't care. As long as you're good people at heart, you're not a problem at all. After all, it's better to love the sinner and hate the sin. Makes life easier and simpler.

That is all. Now let's get back to not-religious stuff! :D
